intro: Pleurostelma africanum, commonly known as the African pleurostelma, is a succulent plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family, and is characterized by its fleshy, water-storing leaves. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow and orange, typically during the cooler months. It thrives in well-draining soil and requires minimal water, making it suitable for arid environments. Due to its unique appearance and adaptability, it is often cultivated as an ornamental plant.
